summary: As a young child Jack the Ripper's daughter witnesses him kill her mother. As a young woman she carries on the murderous reign of her father. A psychiatrist tries to cure her with tragic consequences.
cast: Eric Porter|Angharad Rees|Jane Merrow|Keith Bell|Derek Godfrey|Dora Bryan|Marjorie Rhodes|Lynda Baron|Marjie Lawrence|Norman Bird|Margaret Rawlings|Elizabeth MacLennan|Barry Lowe|A.J. Brown|April Wilding|Anne Clune|Vicki Woolf|Katya Wyeth|Beulah Hughes|Tallulah Miller|Peter Munt|Philip Ryan|Molly Weir|Charles Lamb|Lewis Alexander|Pauline Chamberlain|Maxwell Craig|Josie Grant|Danny Lyons|Dido Plumb|Nadine Stapleton|Ann Way
keywords: sex horror|sex scene|bare breasts|psychiatrist|murder of mother
title: Las manos del destripador
